Question
========
What is the difference between Git and GitHub?

Answerlist
----------
* Git is an online hosting service, and GitHub is a local version control tool
* Git is a version control system, and GitHub is an online hosting platform for Git repositories
* Git is a text editor, and GitHub is a file syncing app
* Git is for website publishing only, and GitHub is for data storage only

Solution
========
Git tracks changes locally, while GitHub hosts repositories online for sharing and collaboration.

* False
